seprhou.gui

Class ButtonLayoutHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • seprhou.gui.ButtonLayoutHelper

  • public class ButtonLayoutHelper
extends Object
    Class used by the main, connecting, highscores and options screens to help the layout of buttons
